title: Video and Language Alignment in 2D Systems for 3D Multi-object Scenes with Multi-Information Derivative-Free Control
dimension: Adaptation to Rapidly Evolving AI Threat Landscape
summary: Cross-modal systems trained on 2D visual inputs are presented with a dimensional shift when processing 3D scenes.
